SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, B.BOOK_NAME, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(Y.AUTHOR_NAME SEPARATOR ', ') FROM BOOK_AUTHOR X, AUTHOR Y WHERE X.AUTHOR_NO = Y.AUTHOR_NO AND X.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO) AUTHORS, C.PUBLISHER_NAME, B.BOOK_LIST_PRICE, B.BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING, D.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, B.CATEGORY_NO, F.CATEGORY_NAME, A.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT B.BOOK_NO, SUM(B.COUNT) AMOUNT FROM BUY A, BUY_BOOK B, BOOK C A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND A.BUY_DATE = CURRENT_DATE()
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND C.CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword}
AND C.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO = 1)
AND A.BUY_NO = B.BUY_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = C.BOOK_NO GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC LIMIT 0, 100) A, BOOK B, PUBLISHER C, BOOK_IMAGES D,CATEGORY F WHERE A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND B.PUBLISHER_NO = C.PUBLISHER_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = D.BOOK_NO AND B.CATEGORY_NO = F.CATEGORY_NO
ORDER BY BOOK_SALES_VOLUME DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_TOTAL_REPLY_CNT DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_SALES_VOLUME DESC
) AS PAGING

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT B.BOOK_NO, SUM(B.COUNT) AMOUNT FROM BUY A, BUY_BOOK B, BOOK C
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND A.BUY_DATE = CURRENT_DATE()
AND A.BUY_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
AND C.CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword}
AND C.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY WHERE PARENT_CATEGORY_NO = 1)
AND A.BUY_NO = B.BUY_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = C.BOOK_NO GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO ORDER BY AMOUNT DESC LIMIT 0, 100) A, BOOK B, PUBLISHER C, BOOK_IMAGES D WHERE A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO AND B.PUBLISHER_NO = C.PUBLISHER_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = D.BOOK_NO
B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 14 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 56 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 84 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 168 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 168 DAY)
ORDER BY BOOK_SALES_VOLUME DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_TOTAL_REPLY_CNT DESC
ORDER BY BOOK_SALES_VOLUME DESC
